abstract: Servando Gomez, leader of Mexican drug gang Knights Templar, is captured by police in Mexico City; Gomez was one of country's most wanted drug kingpins, but experts say his capture will make little difference toward quelling violence in Michoacan state, where drug gangs are rapidly splintering.
lead_paragraph: The police captured Servando Gómez, leader of the Knights Templar drug gang, on Friday, but experts said the victory would make little difference in the larger battle against criminal groups.

headline.main: Capture of a Drug Lord Is a Small Win in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Capture of a Drug Lord Is a Small Win in Mexico

snippet: The police captured Servando Gómez, leader of the Knights Templar drug gang, on Friday, but experts said the victory would make little difference in the larger battle against criminal groups.
